titleInfo.title: Catalogues of Demons as Catalogues of Vices in Medieval German Literature: 'Des Teufels Netz' and the Alexander Romance by Ulrich von Etzenbach
In the Garden of Evil: The Vices and Culture in the Middle Ages

bibliographicCitation.ama: Schumacher M. Catalogues of Demons as Catalogues of Vices in Medieval German Literature: 'Des Teufels Netz' and the Alexander Romance by Ulrich von Etzenbach. In: Newhauser R, ed. In the Garden of Evil: The Vices and Culture in the Middle Ages. Papers in mediaeval studies. Vol 18. Toronto: Pontifical Institute of Mediaeval Studies; 2005: 277-290.
